name: 霍弘毅
objective: Students will review the basic rules for and mechanics of the sentence.  We will precede set-by-step from the Parts of Speech of Words and their Functions in a sentence to Phrases to Clauses to Sentences to Paragraphs to a short Essay.  The elements of Grammar will be our guide to constructing Phrases, and Clauses. Phrases and Clauses in turn will become the elements of Sentences. Sentences will be rhetorically stylized. Then we learn the basic elements of paragraphs.
